entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:19 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:19 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
